articles.title: American Chloe Kim, 21, secures history with consecutive Olympic golds in snowboard halfpipe event - ESPN
articles.description: Chloe Kim, 21, the lone American to make Thursday's final, became the first woman to win two Olympic snowboard gold medals in the halfpipe, taking the event with a first-run score of 94, nearly four points higher than the rest of the field.
